chat_messages.text:
I'm working on Sharpee, a TypeScript-based Interactive Fiction authoring platform. 
Project location: C:\repotemp\sharpee (accessible via MCP)
We recently pivoted from an over-engineered approach to an IF-first design. Current status:
- ‚úÖ Core architecture (channels, events) - keeping these
- ‚úÖ New IF-specific parser with pattern matching and disambiguation 
- üöß Need to simplify world model with IF-specific concepts
- ‚è≥ Need to implement the Forge authoring layer
IMPORTANT: Due to a Claude Desktop bug that erases conversations, I've already started working on the world model simplification but I'm not sure how much was completed before the chat was lost.
Before doing ANY new work, please:
1. Check what files have been recently modified in packages/core/src/world-model/
2. Look for any new IF-specific files or types that may have been created
3. Check if there are any new test files related to world model
4. Look for any partial implementations or TODOs that indicate work in progress
5. Review ROADMAP.md and any new status files dated after May 22, 2025
Once you've determined what work has already been done, summarize your findings and wait for my confirmation before proceeding.
Key project goals for reference:
- Fluent API for non-programmer authors
- Graph-based world model (keep this concept)
- Separate text emission from game logic  
- Multi-language support
- Pattern-based parser (not NLP)
- TypeScript implementation

content.text:
I'm working on Sharpee, a TypeScript-based Interactive Fiction authoring platform. 
Project location: C:\repotemp\sharpee (accessible via MCP)
We recently pivoted from an over-engineered approach to an IF-first design. Current status:
- ‚úÖ Core architecture (channels, events) - keeping these
- ‚úÖ New IF-specific parser with pattern matching and disambiguation 
- üöß Need to simplify world model with IF-specific concepts
- ‚è≥ Need to implement the Forge authoring layer
IMPORTANT: Due to a Claude Desktop bug that erases conversations, I've already started working on the world model simplification but I'm not sure how much was completed before the chat was lost.
Before doing ANY new work, please:
1. Check what files have been recently modified in packages/core/src/world-model/
2. Look for any new IF-specific files or types that may have been created
3. Check if there are any new test files related to world model
4. Look for any partial implementations or TODOs that indicate work in progress
5. Review ROADMAP.md and any new status files dated after May 22, 2025
Once you've determined what work has already been done, summarize your findings and wait for my confirmation before proceeding.
Key project goals for reference:
- Fluent API for non-programmer authors
- Graph-based world model (keep this concept)
- Separate text emission from game logic  
- Multi-language support
- Pattern-based parser (not NLP)
- TypeScript implementation
